Job Title: Technical Leader - Protocol Stack Software Development
Job Description:
Job Description

 The software protocol stack ( Stack ) team at Azcom s India Development Center owns the design,  development and delivery of the 4G,  IoT and 5G protocol stacks and applications that power Azcom s own products,  such as Centralized Base Band Unit,  Small Cell and Network in Box,  and enable Azcom s global design services customers to reduce time to market. Currently,  we are building Azcom s NB- IoT stack and empowering customers in Australia and India to develop products for tactical and eMTC communications. The team is looking for passionate technical leaders who can lead from the front and deliver exceptional results.

 As a technical leader on the Stack team,  you will participate in all phases of the software development life cycle and be responsible for delivering high quality,  optimized software components and subsystems for the Access Network and Core Network elements. You are expected to handle technical interactions with Azcom s global customers off- site and on- site.

 You should have a solid grip on software architecture and design best practices,  and possess in- depth knowledge of the 4G,  IoT and 5G domains and applicable technical standards.

 Location: Gurgaon

 Work Experience Required

 The Technical Leader should possess 6- 8 years of full- cycle (from requirement analysis to customer delivery) software development experience,  preferably in 4G (LTE),  Internet of Things (IoT) or 5G domains.

 Mandatory Technical Skills

 Strong in C/ C++,  Data Structures,  Algorithms Strong in real time OS,  networking,  IPC,  multi- threading Proven track record of design,  development and delivery one or more protocol stacks,  e.g. LTE Layer 2,  Layer 3,  NB- IoT,  eMTC,  etc. Project Management,  control and reporting in an agile environment Experience of working in state of art software development environment,  including IDE,  development automation tools,  version control and artefact management Additional Technical Skills

 Knowledge and application of System Design best practices Experience of code refactoring and optimization Mandatory Behavioural Skills

 Customer centricity Ownership Leadership Excellent analytical skills and problem- solving ability Excellent writing and verbal communication skills Developing others
